author: cms-sw
body:
There is security issue reported for tensorflow 2.6.0 ( https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/security/dependabot/pip/requirements.txt/tensorflow/open ).  This PR updates
- Tensorflow and its friends to version 2.7.0
- Eigen latest commit https://gitlab.com/libeigen/eigen/-/commit/675b72e44bd5a6177aebddc0ca6e754d6cd19dc7
title: Update Tensorflow to version 2.7.0
